career.aplicaziones: My first laboral experience as a trainee while I was studying. I participated in the development of an Android app and a Node.js server.

everis.title: Solutions Assistant (2019-2021)
everis.text: I started as a full stack developer, with an Angular JS frontend and a Java 7 server. In 6 months, I switched teams and I focused on frontend development, at first with an Angular 6 application which was upgraded to Angular 12 a bit later.

everis.title: Solutions Analyst (2021-2022)
everis.text: After a year and a half being junior, I was promoted to analyst, and further my job as developer, I started to participate on technical and functional designs of the project. During this time, I was the top front end developer in Vodafone NTT Data Web Chapter; and I was a code reviewer of the repository.

career.title: My professional career
career.university: I studied Computer Science, which I had very clear on my mind since I was young. I had a GPA of 7 out of 10.
career.vodafone: After 2 years being in the same team, I was hired by Vodafone directly and promoted to Technical Lead of this same team, position I currently hold. The team consists of 4 backend developers, 2 web developers, 2 Android developers and 2 iOS developers.
